name: Dwarfnado
description:
Mine Gold, Protect Train, Survive.

For best experience, play in full screen

How To Play:

Swing Pickaxe - Space Bar

Throw Dynamite - F or L

Move - WASD or Arrow Keys

Increase your chance of survival by collecting gold to buy upgrades.

Mine gold, kill enemies, and survive to increase score.
